title: good gregarius
content: Oh, and apropos my serial enthusiast ways, I've shacked up with a different news aggregator again. I was using newsRiver again, but the temporary lack of a spare server to run it on in the midst of the move had me feedless. So, after a brief flirtation with Bloglines - which went down promptly after I started using it - I switched using Gregarius. I have to say: This is a pretty keen aggregator. It doesn't support reading lists, but I have an itch to implement that support. Otherwise, the feed folders work pretty much how I'd like them to work - as a prioritized and stratified River of News. I might also think about hacking my evolving feed reader template as a drop-in theme for Gregarius.
